Articles.Content:
I know that not only mining an asteroid is possible (and with RoverDude mods, make it a storage space)...

I was wondering if anyone out there has a parts mod that let's you build a ship around an asteroid?

OR if anyone has the parts mods out there to let you re-create the Red Dwarf.

http://cdn.playbuzz.com/cdn/96c0b1e3-1c69-4d8e-812f-6fc9175af97c/2332a7eb-fab5-49c2-8273-88b645be6cbe.jpg

http://images.wikia.com/reddwarf/images/3/39/Ship-BTE.png

http://img08.deviantart.net/f59c/i/2005/148/5/3/red_dwarf_3d_by_euan_the_echidhog.jpg

I am thinking that something like Interstellar Launch Pad would be useful for building the ship around the asteroid, using the asteroid's metals.

Thoughts? Comments? Questions? Please speak up.

Complaints? Riffs? Discouragements? Please keep it to yourself.

- A
There's an orbital factory in the UKS mod so you may want to check that out.

Just recently teamed up with Admiral-Helwyr who's doing Sci-fi mods, here is a glimpse at the RED DWARF I'm working on, will be removing the Asteroid and making it functional. Just thought I'd let you know.

Just recently teamed up with Admiral-Helwyr who's doing Sci-fi mods, here is a glimpse at the RED DWARF I'm working on, will be removing the Asteroid and making it functional. Just thought I'd let you know.

OMG! When you're done please let me know I totally want that!
I promise my full support to this project!

No problem, will let you know, I also want to make all the other ships, there's like 3 Red Dwarfs, plus transporters and who ever else they ran into. It's a big project but it'll get there, feel free to work on the others if you want as I only have the small original ship in the works.

After a quick look I'm doing the second version, Here is a link to the 1st so if you want to do that> Send me a message and let me know, also you Red Dwarf if your interested, I'm doing alot of things (personal mods, Star Wars) so help is always appreciated.

Edited September 15, 2015 by Lt Vax
Info Update

Well after doing a bit and looking for more images for reference I found this Red Dwarf Starbug KSP, old mod but I did find a really good model for Starbug (No need to rework the whole thing) so I will work on that also.
